DOC.brief_summary: Postoperative nausea vomiting ( PONV ) common distress side effect follow Laparoscopic cholecystectomy
DOC.brief_title: Dexamethasone With Super-hydration Prevention Postoperative Nausea Vomiting
DOC.detailed_description: In operating room , standard monitor include electrocardiogram , noninvasive arterial blood pressure , arterial oxygen saturation , end-tidal carbon dioxide connect . All patient receive standardized anesthetic technique . At end surgery , gastric content suction via orogastric tube extubation . Atropine neostigmine ( 1/2.5 mg ) give slowly I.V . antagonize residual neuromuscular block . Then , trachea extubated . Then , patient transfer post-anesthesia care unit stable condition . Patients allow drink liquid soon request .
